# Pull Request

## Description

Summarize the changes made in this pull request and the motivation behind them. (E.g "Added support for paired-end reads in the alignment step by modifying `alignment_tool.py` to accept two input files.")

---

## Type of Change

Check the type of change you are introducing:

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that changes existing functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other

## Related Issues

Link to related github issues or discussions (E.g Resolves #123). If none, write N/A.

## Checklist

Before submitting, ensure the following:

- [ ] I have read the contributing guidelines.
- [ ] I have added tests that verify the changes.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation to reflect the changes.
- [ ] I have verified that all tests pass locally.
